GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS
Issued at 04.00 p.m. on 20 May 2024
The  Southwest monsoon  conditions  are  gradually establishing  over  the  island; hence,  the  prevailing
showery and windy conditions will continue further.

C
loudy skies are expected over the island.

S
howers or thundershowers will occur at times in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central, North-western and
Northern provinces and in Galle and Matara districts.

provinces and in Galle, Matara, Kandy, Nuwara-Eliya and Mannar districts.

airly strong winds about (30-40) kmph can be expected at times over the island.
